GitHub is how people build software!We’re supporting a community where more than 23 million people learn, share, and work together to build software.

Pivotal, the company at the intersection of big data, cloud fabric, and agile development, helps companies transform into great software companies. It starts with Pivotal One, a comprehensive solution that includes a set of application and data services that run on top of Pivotal CF, a turnkey cloud-native platform for agile development teams to rapidly update and scale applications on a private cloud that can be instantly expanded and upgraded with no downtime, allowing enterprises to innovate with disruptive speed.

The three main goals of the VCE User Group are:1. to provide a forum for Vblock systems users to exchange information and ideas on how they are using, managing and supporting our Vblock systems;2. to obtain up-to-date information from VCE and complementary technology companies on their product roadmaps and services plans; and3. to provide feedback to the VCE on challenges faced and potential feature/product requests.

Oversee the design, architecture and implementation / deployment of Private, Hybrid, and Multi-vendor Public Clouds. Build capabilities for self-service access, on-demand scalability, and workflow and release automation. Define detailed reference architectures, execution roadmaps, and technology plans for new service offerings, collaborating with business and technology leaders to align with business objectives.

Responsible for providing technical expertise in installations, configurations and the maintenance of the Linux, UNIX, Windows, and Virtual Machine operating systems of servers and mid-size to large computer systems.  Architect solutions to meet long-term requirements of systems operations and maintain the integrity and reliability of the system.

Christian is probably the friendliest IT person I have EVER met! He always has a smile on his face and an infectious laugh. During the time I worked with him at Apollo, he was 1 of 2 Principal Cloud Architects that I worked with. He was very instrumental in getting the project completed much faster than others would have, thanks to his people skills. He is highly technical when he needs to, but can also draw the big picture for executives. Working with everyday was a blast, since he pushed me beyond my comfort zone, but I was happy he did that. I have learnt a lot from him which I still use in my current role.

Christian is one of the most valuable infrastructure architects I have worked with.  He provided the architecture and design for multiple large-scale Oracle RAC solutions that provided significant cost savings, performance increases and platform stability.  He introduced Exadata and drove huge performance gains for the Oracle Financial infrastructure.  Over the last couple years, Christian provided leadership and key analysis of Amazon, Rackspace, Verizon, Joyent, and others to help establish our multi-provider and DR strategy for cloud services.  Christian is a significant contributor to the overall datacenter, automation and DevOps platform, and he is a valuable asset for realizing strategic objectives.

I've enjoyed working with Christian over the past few years. He keeps surprising me. When I first met him, he was an Oracle DBA at our company, and so I assumed that his technical background was mostly in Oracle. Over time I discovered that his technology interests and competencies are much broader. He does a lot, such as leading architectural discussions on the cloud, establishing private cloud solutions, creating and presenting designs for data HA, vendor evaluation, and even weighing in on the relative merits of RabbitMQ and ActiveMQ. Later I found out that he's even a math and physics geek.I mentioned vendor evaluation. One of Christian's strengths is that he is on top of what's happening in industry--technology trends, vendor offerings, and that sort of thing. He does a great job bringing that information into the company.Something that everybody likes about Christian is that he creates an environment of camaraderie. I won't try to explain it here, but everybody who knows him knows exactly what I mean. It is very pleasant to work with him. He is a very knowledgeable and yet humble leader.

Christian Lewis is a dear friend and long-time colleague. He is one of the most results driven individuals I have ever worked with and he has more drive that ten people.  Christian strives for 100% satisfaction for his internal customers and has zero tolerance for poor services.  I worked with Christian for two years and he impressed me every day with his leadership style and his spectacular technical depth. He stays current on all IT technologies. He was the leader in the Cloud delivery project at Apollo, as well as, a massive infrastructure automation program.  He was instrumental in establishing AGILE teams for fast infrastructure deployment. Christian is extremely well respected at Apollo and the senior leadership team members trust him and leverage his talents -- daily.  In closing, Christian is the glue that holds many teams together and he easily ties technology with business, people and process. He is THE BEST.

Sri is an amazingly skilled developer who has the creativity to design data-driven application solutions for any enterprise and the talent to successfully implement those designs to production. I highly recommend Sri and I specifically request his involvement for any of my development initiatives.

Steve is an intelligent manager, inspiring leader, and trusted mentor and advisor. I have worked with him on many initiatives over the years and he consistently brings a high level of professionalism and leadership. I have had the pleasure of working with Steve as a provider, peer, and business partner; in all of these aspects, his professionalism and technology knowledge are very highly regarded. Steve has an incredible understanding of both technology and business process that makes him an expert and advisor to many different enterprises. Over the years I've known him, Steve ushered in an increased level of stability in these areas and increased performance and reliability to business processes from financial systems to document management and enterprise reporting.I would welcome the opportunity to work with him again in any capacity.
